scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Ditmas lantern slide collection dates from circa 1851 to 1905 and contains 53 lantern slides measuring 1 linear foot. The collection includes both black-and-white and hand colored slides depicting farms, barns, rural areas, boathouses, street scenes, buildings, and residences. Most locations are unidentified.
